casebody.data:
Norman R. COLON, Appellant,
v.
PORSCHE OF ROSLYN, Defendant, Porsche Leasing, Ltd. et al., Respondents. 2019-204 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided May 9, 2019

Motion for reargument of motion for leave to appeal denied with one hundred dollars costs and necessary reproduction disbursements [see 32 N.Y.3d 913, 2019 WL 191842 (2019) ].
